TopicTitle: Any mods that add new solar systems?

Articles.Content:
I would like to find some planet mods that add new stars and planets, not replace the stock system.

I already have OPM and GEP. Is there anything else?

There are a number of threads listing planetpacks, I think the latest is https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/206922-i-was-wondering-if-my-quest-for-tracking-all-of-the-well-known-kind-of-a-little-bit-famous-at-least-and-good-planet-and-star-mods-is-finally-complete-or-if-perhaps-someone-here-could-help-me-find-a-hidden-gem/

You'll definitely find something there
